page.title: 14The Library.
page.content: In 1976 the{community library}was built.It opened a year after in 1977.The{community centre}was opened at the same time.The{community centre} and the library come under the same heading.In the library there is a rough estimate of 5,000 books.The most popular books for adults are by Catherine Cookson and for children they are by Enid Blyton.The library is built on the old school playground because the{community}centre used to be the village school.Another estimate shows 1,740 members in the Blackmore library.About 500 books are taken out a week.The library has more adults members than children.The{information {system}also has tapes for blind people,music and language tapes.The library is also an information service with exhibitions and presently there is one of old photographs of Blackmore
